name: 生物地理與自然保育研討
comment: 上課教室：文學院勤9F地理系研討室六。
description:
1.瞭解生物地理學在自然保育所扮演的角色與實際運用的方式。
2.培育學生正確的保育觀念，並對自然環境有充分的關懷。
3.修習本課程將可學得基礎的自然保護區劃設方法與經營方式。
goals: 瞭解生物地理學在自然保育所扮演的角色與實際運用的方式
培育學生正確的保育觀念，並對自然環境有充分的關懷
修習本課程將可學得基礎的自然保護區劃設方法與經營方式
syllabus:
1\. Conservation biogeography (part 1)  
2\. Conservation biogeography (part 2)  
3\. Effects of habitat destruction  
4\. Effects of habitat disturbance  
5\. Selecting protected areas  
6\. Design and monitoring of protected areas  
7\. Design and monitoring of protected areas with modern technologies  
8\. In situ conservation  
9\. Ex situ conservation  
10.Landscape scale conservation (part 1)  
11.Landscape scale conservation (part 2)  
12.Ecological restoration (part 1)  
12.Ecological restoration (part 2)  
13.Landscape conservation  
14.Community-based conservation  
15.Community-based conservation  
16.Conservation challenges in the 21st Century
